name: Round'n Rock: Awautá
description:
Round'n Rock: Awautá

A Planet Into Many Confusions

Be the master of a round rock floating through space. It's your planet. You know. Strange things can happen to a planet. Take care. Be smart. Make it thrive and survive!

Guide your planet through craaɐazy events and try to get to an end!

Awautá means "round home" in Tupi.

Contributing to this project will help us to finish this game, and maybe save the world. If we reach the goal, the promise is to develop dozens of new events and endings. This game is supposed to be elegant, joyful and funny. And you are the only hope!

Any donations above $10 will grant you access to all pre-releases.

Entrepreneurs that wish to make history: take a look at the prizes, too! All exclusive single piece chalk illustrations on its original format, the only sample in existence on this planet. (Sizes of aprox. 9 x 9 to 15 x 20 cm, with or without frame.)
